title: GET_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER_VAR_COUNT
content:
0x60FB60FE// GetTimecycleModifierVarCount
int GET_TIMECYCLE_MODIFIER_VAR_COUNT(char* modifierName);Parameters:modifierName: The timecycle modifier name.Returns: The amount of variables used on a specified timecycle modifier.Examples:Lualocal varCount = GetTimecycleModifierVarCount("underwater")

if varCount ~= 0 then
  for index = 0, varCount - 1 do
    local varName = GetTimecycleModifierVarNameByIndex(index)

    print(string.format("[%d] %s", index, varName))
  end
end
codeBlocks:
local varCount = GetTimecycleModifierVarCount("underwater")

if varCount ~= 0 then
  for index = 0, varCount - 1 do
    local varName = GetTimecycleModifierVarNameByIndex(index)

    print(string.format("[%d] %s", index, varName))
  end
end
